mapper.select: SELECT BOOKINGNUM, ROOMNAME , TO_CHAR(CHECKINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECKINDATE , TO_CHAR(CHECKOUTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECKOUTDATE FROM BOOKINGVIEW WHERE CAMPGROUNDID = #{campgroundId} ORDER BY BOOKINGDATE DESC

SELECT BOOKINGNUM, ROOMID, ROOMNAME, NAME, PHONE, VISITNUM , TO_CHAR(CHECKINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECKINDATE , TO_CHAR(CHECKOUTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECKOUTDATE FROM BOOKINGVIEW WHERE CAMPGROUNDID = #{campgroundId} AND TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN CHECKINDATE AND (CHECKOUTDATE-1)
SELECT ROOMID, ROOMNAME FROM ROOM WHERE CAMPGROUNDID = #{campgroundId} ORDER BY ROOMID

SELECT BOOKINGNUM, ROOMID, ROOMNAME , NAME, PHONE, VISITNUM, PAYMENTAMOUNT , BOOKINGDATE , TO_CHAR(CHECKINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECKINDATE , TO_CHAR(CHECKOUTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECKOUTDATE , CASE WHEN (FLOOR(CHECKINDATE - SYSDATE)) >= 10 THEN POLICYSTANDARD3 WHEN (FLOOR(CHECKINDATE - SYSDATE)) >=4 THEN POLICYSTANDARD2 WHEN (FLOOR(CHECKINDATE - SYSDATE)) >=0 THEN POLICYSTANDARD1 END AS REFUND , NVL(REQUEST, ' ') AS REQUEST FROM BOOKINGVIEW BV LEFT JOIN REFUNDPOLICY RP ON BV.CAMPGROUNDID = RP.CAMPGROUNDID WHERE BOOKINGNUM = #{bookingNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKING_CANCEL (CANCELNUM, BOOKINGNUM, MEMBERNUM, CANCELDATE, REFUND) VALUES( 'BC' || TO_CHAR( SEQBOOK_CAN.NEXTVAL, 'FM0000'), #{bookingNum}, #{num}, SYSDATE, #{refund})
